title: Pick ems
body: I don't give a damn what anyone says, if anyone still have perfect picks after today... They litterally made an account for EVERY possible outcome because no one would actually pick the outcome of G2 wins over RNG at the same time IG beats KT

replies.body: FK DEM PICK'EMS, LETS GO EU
G2 messed up my pickems and it was so worth it.
I didn't do well on group picks, but perfect quarter finals.

Both 100% pick rate have Fnatic as the champ

Soooooooooo not really

Not like a lot of people care now GO WEST WIN!

Actually I did predict G2 to beat RNG. I learned from my mistakes from group stage.
Their gameplay is so cheesy but it's so strong in this meta. RNG struggles when it's not standard 5v5 games and when teams force their hand.

I'm still not sure if it's entirely because of the meta or because the players from the west also got a lot better. One thing is certain: individual mechanical plays > shotcalling and that's a huge benefit for western teams who always failed in the lategame shotcalls.

But yeah, I thought KT would make it to finals, though. guess FNC will have to beat G2 then.
Except I did and I fucking KNEW G2 would win.

> [{quoted}](name=HopeStartsWithU,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=ybPQdRWk,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-10-20T13:15:18.461+0000)
>
> Except I did and I fucking KNEW G2 would win.

You are not one of the two people that have perfect picks shut up.
Ofc I don't have the perfect pick em lmao, this year group stage was impossible to guess. But I got the knockout stage right. Well at least for now because I went for the "FNC vs G2" finals lmao

> [{quoted}](name=HopeStartsWithU,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=ybPQdRWk,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-10-20T14:12:15.538+0000)
>
> Ofc I don't have the perfect pick em lmao, this year group stage was impossible to guess. But I got the knockout stage right. Well at least for now because I went for the "FNC vs G2" finals lmao

But who to win the finals? (Obv fnatic) but after g2 performance would you keep fnatic

Honestly I picked fnatic but after that g2 performance i have no fucking idea LOL. Like I expected G2 to win but I didn't expect such stomps in the last 2 games, meaning they adapt pretty well in a best of 5. But i guess I will just keep fnatic there

Got my icon from group stage.  RIP my knockout stage pick'ems, but who cares?
Best.
Worlds.
EVER.

Go C9 and FNC!

I forgot to lock in my pick ‘ems, but between G2 beating RNG and kt losing bo5, I wouldn’t have even been close anyways.

I am now rooting for C9 to win the crown

Ok, so if Fnatic and C9 are not winning my pick'em is totally screwed.
I decided to do logical picks for lower tree and antihype for upper one.
I have 24 points and I just want the 34 to get the icon. I wanted to say C9 to win but I changed it in case the lower bracket screwed me. I have Fnatic for finals so they are my last resort.
I'm fully invested into tomorrow now!
For NA to disappoint like we always do?  RNG and KT the final bosses are already eliminated and now all NA has to do is beat the 'weaker' LCK team but I doubt it.
It was a bonggers day. OMG it was Amazing!!!!!!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
This is all starting to feel like the lottery...
